name: Beat Blader 3D: Dash and Slash
description:
BEAT BLADER 3D should be your must - have game 😎😎😎

Beat Blader 3D is an impressive rhythm games which provides you the best experience that no app can offer.🎶🎶🎶
Swipe left, right in free style based on the position of the cubes and cut it. Fasten your speed as the more skillful you are, the harder it gets. 💪💪💪


YOUR MISSION
1. Choose your favorite songs
2. Feel the rhythm
3. Pay attention to the direction on the cubes
4. Move to slash the beats with your saber as they come closer and avoid the obstacles

WHY BEAT BLADER 3D?

1. It's FANTASTIC 💥You will definitely ❤❤❤ it because of:
- Attractive but simple design; various themes for different songs; impressive color.
- Easy to follow direction so that you can swipe wisely.
- Popular songs updated weekly, all are in original version, tons of music genres such as Pop, EDM, Rock, Classic, etc
- Exclusive level design, there are 3 levels of each song for you to challenge your skills.
- Allow to use both hands.
- Nice swipe as you cut the cubes, the more skillful you are, the better it looks.
- Catchy rhythm, generated carefully for better music experience.

2. It's FUN 🤩
Beat Blader 3D is a useful games to
- Enhance your rhythm sense
- Boost cognitive skills and train brain
- Compete other players
- Kill time and relax
- Sing along with your favorite songs

Now, grab this game and SLICE the BEAT. It's time to become the HERO of Beat Blader 3D! 🤟🤟🤟
